entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
